crew.notes: Pilot, Co-Pilot, Gunner, Crew Chief, Enginseer

system.weapons:
Co-Pilot: Twin-Linked Las-Breacher (Front, Range 220m (2 AU's), S/-/-, 3d10+10 E, Pen 15, Clip 10, Reload -, Inaccurate, Twin-Linked

Gunner: AP Autocannon (All, Range 300m (3 AU's), S/2/5, 4d10+5 I, Pen 8, Clip 200, Reload 2 Full
system.specialRules: Is a Spacecraft, can act as Flyer or Skimmer in Atmosphere, following relevent rules and work in and out of atmosphere. When receiving Critical Hits not as a result of Righteous Fury, halve the result, rounding up. Can affix to Spacecraft ship hull as +0 Pilot(Space Craft) Test and spend 4 Full Rounds to burn throough using Las-Breacher and Boarding Clamp Melta Charges. Has Craft Rating of +5 for Attack Craft Purposes, squadron size 8.
